p: Therefore, the detailed mapping within this study can further improve the results of the current status of the blueberry species invasion. Repeated data collection in the same area, as planned, will provide a year-to-year comparison, which will allow for the monitoring and analysis of the ongoing spread in the wetlands. Changes will be easily detectable within the wetlands and the studied blueberry species without disturbances of vulnerable plant and animal species and habitats, as already mentioned by [ 30, 35].
